parameters.description: only fill paramereters that the user asks for. Default is rain, temperature and wind_speed set to true, and the time interval for the next 24 hours

day.description: Day the forecast is for, e.g. 'tuesday', or enter the number of relative days, e.g. today is '0', the day after tomorrow is '2', and in four days is '4', or enter the amount of days using [], so a the next week would be '[7]'

time_interval.description: The amount of hours for the forecast, e.g. this evening could be interpreted as '6'

time_of_day.description: witch hour on the day, the interval starts, e.g. this evening would be '17'

function.name: adjust_microphone
function.description: Adjust the microphone for background noise

function.name: look_through_memory
function.description: Can look through earlier conversations. Oftenly activatet with phrases like: 'based on what we talked about' or 'do you remember?'.

function.name: web_search
function.description: Use a web query to get wanted information

search_query.description: The search query that can be used for a google search, e.g. 'birth rate denmark'
